title: Ticket #7354: Move GRIDMANAGER_SELECTION_EXPR doc to the GridManager section
description:
I was looking for the GRIDMANAGER_SELECTION_EXPR under the "condor_gridmanager Configuration File Entries" [1] but couldn't find it. Turns out it's listed under the schedd section.

[1] https://htcondor.readthedocs.io/en/stable/admin-manual/configuration-macros.html#condor-schedd-configuration-file-entries
remarks:
2019-Nov-06 13:59:01 by blin:
The new text is a big improvement!
check_ins: 2019-Nov-06 13:55   Check-in [58388]: (#7354) Move GRIDMANAGER_SELECTION_EXPR from the schedd section to the gridmanager section and try to clarify the wording a bit. (By Todd L Miller )
creator: blin
